tests.description: Retrieves products grouped under a specific category.
Deletes a product based on the ID and returns the deleted product details with delete status.
Updates product fields (price, title, stock, etc.) for the specified product ID.
Fetches product prices only (subset of product data), used for price comparison or validation.
Retrieves a paginated list of products based on the specified limit parameter.
Retrieves the complete list of all product categories available in the system.
Returns the product titles only (subset of product data), useful for filtering and UI validation.
